target_name: 2025년까지 5세 미만의 발육부진 및 쇠약에 관한 국제 목표 달성을 포함하여 2030년까지 모든 형태의 영양 부족을 종식시키고 여성 청소년, 임산부, 수유여성 및 노년층의 영양상태 개선
computation_definitions:
국제기구통계(2유형)
국제기구에서 추정 및 모델링 등을 통해 작성한 한국 데이터입니다.
UN SDGs 지표에 대응하는 국내 통계가 없는 경우에 국제기구통계를 통해 모니터링 중입니다.
indicator_definition: 5세 미만 중 신장이 세계보건기구(WHO) 아동성장표준 중위신장으로부터 –2표준편차에 미달하는 아동의 비율
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEFF), World Health Organisation (WHO)
title: Untitled

en.title: Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age
en.graph_title: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted
en.indicator_name: Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age
en.target: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
en.national_indicator_description: This indicator is defined as the percentage of children aged 0–59 months, whose length or height-for-age values  are below minus two standard deviations from the WHO Child Growth Standards median.
en.global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 232kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
